mapper.sql: id, user_id, egg_type_id, egg_type_name, quotation_location, quotation_max_price, quotation_avg_price, quotation_min_price, quotation_status, quotation_float_status,quotation_type, data_date, create_time, update_time, is_delete
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, JSON_OBJECT( 'nickName', biz_user.nick_name, 'userAvatar',biz_user.user_avatar, 'userDesc',biz_user.user_desc ) as userJson, JSON_ARRAYAGG( JSON_OBJECT( 'id', biz_egg_quotation.id, 'eggTypeName', biz_egg_quotation.egg_type_name, 'quotationType',case (biz_egg_quotation.quotation_type) when 1 THEN '收购价' when 2 THEN '销售价' END , 'quotationLocation',biz_egg_quotation.quotation_location, 'quotationAvgPrice', biz_egg_quotation.quotation_avg_price, 'quotationMaxPrice', biz_egg_quotation.quotation_max_price, 'quotationMinPrice', biz_egg_quotation.quotation_min_price, 'quotationFloatStatus',biz_egg_quotation.quotation_float_status, 'date', data_date ) ) AS jsonArr FROM biz_egg_quotation left JOIN biz_user ON biz_user.id = biz_egg_quotation.user_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
